biotools.summary: Tool for searching the Pfam database using a parallelized version of the program hmmpfam. The user can perform queries with one or more sequences at a time and then receive the results by e-mail.

bioschemas.name: SledgeHMMER
bioschemas.summary: Tool for searching the Pfam database using a parallelized version of the program hmmpfam. The user can perform queries with one or more sequences at a time and then receive the results by e-mail.
